541-549, and 551-553 Hudson Street, west side, at and north

720577f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Perry Street
720577f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Perry Street, Manhattan, NY

722554f-b.title: Manhattan: Perry Street - Hudson Street
722554f-b.text:
(1)
Perry Street, west from No. 99 (right) a point east of Hudson,
across same to West Streets and showing the Ninth Ave. Elevated Line
on Greenwich Street.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A similar view slightly westward.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
Another view photographed from a point midway between Greenwich
and Washington Streets. The elevated structure shown is that of
New York Central Railroad which runs on Washington Street. The
5-story tenements appearing on the left are Nos. 135 and 137.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
722554f-b.folder: Perry Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

722553f-a.title: Manhattan: Perry Street - Hudson Street
722553f-a.text:
Perry Street, east from Hudson Street and showing respectively at
the N.W. and N.E. corners of Bleecker Street, two white buildings;
Nos. 91 (also 386 Bleecker Street) and 87 (also 385 Bleecker Street).
August 3, 1937.
